Journal Story: Finally we are at the day before... I have been planning this hike on the Appalachian Trail since March of this year. I have been going through tons of emotions from being excited to scared, anxious to determined. Since we have never done a backpacking trip before, we a "getting our feet wet" with only doing the Connecticut portion of the AT this year.   Our goal is to eventually do the whole Appalachian Trail from Georgia to Maine but we have big dreams and small wallets, so we are starting small and leaning tons! We have our gear, our bags are packed (then re-packed because the rain has moved in and will be with us for our journey) but we are ready...

Start location: Hoyt Rd. - CT start of AT
Destination: Mt Algo or Stewart Hollow Brook

Start location: Mt Algo or Stewart Hollow Brook
